title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 161.1 - Change of election-general
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 161.1 - Change of election-general

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 661

Elections by taxpayers for New York State personal income
tax purposes are of two kinds: (a) those as to which article 22 of the Tax Law provides that the taxpayer's
election for Federal income tax purposes be binding for New York State personal
income tax purposes; and
(b) those
as to which article 22 authorizes a different or independent election for New

York State personal income tax purposes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
161.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
